      • ConvertMoveInput

        public String ConvertMoveInput​(Board board,
                               char pos1from,
                               int pos2from)
        Converts the user input for position to internal conform input
        Parameters:
        board - : board object pos2from: second position integer e.g.: 1 (a1)
        pos1from - first position character e.g.: a (a1)
        pos2from - second position integer e.g.: 1 (a1)
        Returns:
        converted version as String e.g.: 07

      • convertMoveInput2

        public String convertMoveInput2​(Board board,
                                int pos1new,
                                int pos2from)
        method which converts second position of the input
        Parameters:
        board - board the move is on
        pos1new - x axis starting position of the figure
        pos2from - y axis starting position of the figure
        Returns:
        converted version as String e.g.: 07

      • setCurrentTurn

        public void setCurrentTurn​(int x)
        set-method to set current players turn
        Parameters:
        x - 0 if white, 1 if black

      • getCurrentTurn

        public int getCurrentTurn()
        get-method to get current players turn
        Returns:
        CurrentTurn 0 if white, 1 if black
